document.full_text: with wednesday night's impressive road victory over the atlanta hawks, the denver nuggets improved to 9-2 since the trade that sent carmelo anthony to the knicks.
document.title: keeping score: why the nuggets are winning
lines_and_colors: with wednesday night's impressive road victory over the atlanta hawks, the denver nuggets improved to 9-2 since the trade that sent carmelo anthony to the knicks.
